title: Transferring from NA to OCE
body:
I recently wanted to get back into playing LoL so I started up a new account. After playing a few games on the NA servers, the ping is just too bad to deal with. I was wondering if there is any way to transfer to OCE without having to spend 2600 Riot Points ($20+)?

Thanks.

replies.body: The only way to do this was with the free transfer when the server first opened. The only way to transfer now is to pay.
